apple_vendor_description: The woman supervillain emoji on Apple devices embodies dramatic flair with her medium-dark skin tone and piercing gaze, framed by flowing dark hair. Her costume, rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading, features rich, deep colors and sharp accents that convey power and a hint of danger.  The subtle, realistic lighting emphasizes the contours of her face and costume, making her appear formidable and ready to enact her grand schemes in digital communication.
